00009 /*
00010  * Somewhat simplified version of the gss api.
00011  *
00012  * Dug Song <dugsong@monkey.org>
00013  * Andy Adamson <andros@umich.edu>
00014  * Bruce Fields <bfields@umich.edu>
00015  * Copyright (c) 2000 The Regents of the University of Michigan
00016  *
00017  */
00018 
00019 #ifndef __PTLRPC_GSS_GSS_API_H_
00020 #define __PTLRPC_GSS_GSS_API_H_
00021 
00022 struct gss_api_mech;
00023 
00024 /* The mechanism-independent gss-api context: */
00025 struct gss_ctx {
00026         struct gss_api_mech    *mech_type;
00027         void                   *internal_ctx_id;
00028 };
00029 
00030 #define GSS_C_NO_BUFFER         ((rawobj_t) 0)
00031 #define GSS_C_NO_CONTEXT        ((struct gss_ctx *) 0)
00032 #define GSS_C_NULL_OID          ((rawobj_t) 0)
00033 
00034 /*
00035  * gss-api prototypes; note that these are somewhat simplified versions of
00036  * the prototypes specified in RFC 2744.
00037  */
00038 __u32 lgss_import_sec_context(
00039                 rawobj_t                *input_token,
00040                 struct gss_api_mech     *mech,
00041                 struct gss_ctx         **ctx);
00042 __u32 lgss_copy_reverse_context(
00043                 struct gss_ctx          *ctx,
00044                 struct gss_ctx         **ctx_new);
00045 __u32 lgss_inquire_context(
00046                 struct gss_ctx          *ctx,
00047                 unsigned long           *endtime);
00048 __u32 lgss_get_mic(
00049                 struct gss_ctx          *ctx,
00050                 int                      msgcnt,
00051                 rawobj_t                *msgs,
00052                 int                      iovcnt,
00053                 lnet_kiov_t             *iovs,
00054                 rawobj_t                *mic_token);
00055 __u32 lgss_verify_mic(
00056                 struct gss_ctx          *ctx,
00057                 int                      msgcnt,
00058                 rawobj_t                *msgs,
00059                 int                      iovcnt,
00060                 lnet_kiov_t             *iovs,
00061                 rawobj_t                *mic_token);
00062 __u32 lgss_wrap(
00063                 struct gss_ctx          *ctx,
00064                 rawobj_t                *gsshdr,
00065                 rawobj_t                *msg,
00066                 int                      msg_buflen,
00067                 rawobj_t                *out_token);
00068 __u32 lgss_unwrap(
00069                 struct gss_ctx          *ctx,
00070                 rawobj_t                *gsshdr,
00071                 rawobj_t                *token,
00072                 rawobj_t                *out_msg);
00073 __u32 lgss_prep_bulk(
00074                 struct gss_ctx          *gctx,
00075                 struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc);
00076 __u32 lgss_wrap_bulk(
00077                 struct gss_ctx          *gctx,
00078                 struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc,
00079                 rawobj_t                *token,
00080                 int                      adj_nob);
00081 __u32 lgss_unwrap_bulk(
00082                 struct gss_ctx          *gctx,
00083                 struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc,
00084                 rawobj_t                *token,
00085                 int                      adj_nob);
00086 __u32 lgss_delete_sec_context(
00087                 struct gss_ctx         **ctx);
00088 int lgss_display(
00089                 struct gss_ctx          *ctx,
00090                 char                    *buf,
00091                 int                      bufsize);
00092 
00093 struct subflavor_desc {
00094         __u32           sf_subflavor;
00095         __u32           sf_qop;
00096         __u32           sf_service;
00097         char           *sf_name;
00098 };
00099 
00100 /* Each mechanism is described by the following struct: */
00101 struct gss_api_mech {
00102         struct list_head        gm_list;
00103         struct module          *gm_owner;
00104         char                   *gm_name;
00105         rawobj_t                gm_oid;
00106         atomic_t                gm_count;
00107         struct gss_api_ops     *gm_ops;
00108         int                     gm_sf_num;
00109         struct subflavor_desc  *gm_sfs;
00110 };
00111 
00112 /* and must provide the following operations: */
00113 struct gss_api_ops {
00114         __u32 (*gss_import_sec_context)(
00115                         rawobj_t               *input_token,
00116                         struct gss_ctx         *ctx);
00117         __u32 (*gss_copy_reverse_context)(
00118                         struct gss_ctx         *ctx,
00119                         struct gss_ctx         *ctx_new);
00120         __u32 (*gss_inquire_context)(
00121                         struct gss_ctx         *ctx,
00122                         unsigned long          *endtime);
00123         __u32 (*gss_get_mic)(
00124                         struct gss_ctx         *ctx,
00125                         int                     msgcnt,
00126                         rawobj_t               *msgs,
00127                         int                     iovcnt,
00128                         lnet_kiov_t            *iovs,
00129                         rawobj_t               *mic_token);
00130         __u32 (*gss_verify_mic)(
00131                         struct gss_ctx         *ctx,
00132                         int                     msgcnt,
00133                         rawobj_t               *msgs,
00134                         int                     iovcnt,
00135                         lnet_kiov_t            *iovs,
00136                         rawobj_t               *mic_token);
00137         __u32 (*gss_wrap)(
00138                         struct gss_ctx         *ctx,
00139                         rawobj_t               *gsshdr,
00140                         rawobj_t               *msg,
00141                         int                     msg_buflen,
00142                         rawobj_t               *out_token);
00143         __u32 (*gss_unwrap)(
00144                         struct gss_ctx         *ctx,
00145                         rawobj_t               *gsshdr,
00146                         rawobj_t               *token,
00147                         rawobj_t               *out_msg);
00148         __u32 (*gss_prep_bulk)(
00149                         struct gss_ctx         *gctx,
00150                         struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc);
00151         __u32 (*gss_wrap_bulk)(
00152                         struct gss_ctx         *gctx,
00153                         struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc,
00154                         rawobj_t               *token,
00155                         int                     adj_nob);
00156         __u32 (*gss_unwrap_bulk)(
00157                         struct gss_ctx         *gctx,
00158                         struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc,
00159                         rawobj_t               *token,
00160                         int                     adj_nob);
00161         void (*gss_delete_sec_context)(
00162                         void                   *ctx);
00163         int  (*gss_display)(
00164                         struct gss_ctx         *ctx,
00165                         char                   *buf,
00166                         int                     bufsize);
00167 };
00168 
00169 int lgss_mech_register(struct gss_api_mech *mech);
00170 void lgss_mech_unregister(struct gss_api_mech *mech);
00171 
00172 struct gss_api_mech * lgss_OID_to_mech(rawobj_t *oid);
00173 struct gss_api_mech * lgss_name_to_mech(char *name);
00174 struct gss_api_mech * lgss_subflavor_to_mech(__u32 subflavor);
00175 
00176 struct gss_api_mech * lgss_mech_get(struct gss_api_mech *mech);
00177 void lgss_mech_put(struct gss_api_mech *mech);
00178 
00179 #endif /* __PTLRPC_GSS_GSS_API_H_ */
